name.japanese: 将軍砲（ジェネラルキャノン）

description: Franky Shogun's most powerful attack. The robot brings its arms together, fills them with air, and fires a giant blast of compressed air toward the target. Described as a land-based version of the Thousand Sunny's Gaon Cannon.

firstUse.context: Used against Buffalo and Baby 5, dealing heavy damage across a large area of Punk Hazard's ice mountains.
firstUse.result: Successfully damaged both opponents and the surrounding terrain

strengths: Can damage multiple enemies and terrain simultaneously

description: Baby 5 transforms part of herself into a large sickle blade using her Buki Buki no Mi powers. Effective for piercing attacks, especially when combined with Buffalo's spinning abilities.

firstUse.context: Buffalo spins Baby 5 on his chains, and she uses this form to impale Franky Shogun's left arm, penetrating the armor.

strengths: Synergizes with Buffalo's rotation for increased momentum
weaknesses: Requires coordination with Buffalo for maximum effectiveness

name.japanese: フライングディスクガール

description: Baby 5 transforms into a flying disk shape using her Buki Buki no Mi powers. This is an anime-original technique not shown in the manga.

firstUse.context: Used during the battle against Franky Shogun.
firstUse.result: Contributed to the attack on Franky

description: Baby 5 transforms into a fire-based weapon using her Buki Buki no Mi powers. This is an anime-original technique not shown in the manga.

firstUse.context: Used during the battle against Franky Shogun.
firstUse.result: Contributed to the attack on Franky

name.japanese: 雷雲=繁殖（サンダー=ブリードテンポ）

description: Nami creates a powerful lightning attack using her Clima-Tact. She first uses Weather Egg and Gust Sword to set up atmospheric conditions, then unleashes a devastating lightning strike capable of hitting multiple airborne targets.

firstUse.context: Used to knock Buffalo, Baby 5, and Caesar Clown out of the sky as they attempted to escape.
firstUse.result: Successfully knocked all three targets down from the air

weaknesses: Requires setup with Weather Egg and wind generation

description: A weather manipulation technique used by Nami to set up atmospheric conditions for other attacks. Creates the necessary weather patterns for more powerful techniques.

firstUse.context: Used as setup for Thunder Breed Tempo against Buffalo and Baby 5.
firstUse.result: Successfully created conditions for lightning attack

name.japanese: 突撃流星群（トツゲキリュウセイグン）

description: Usopp shoots several projectiles in rapid succession at targets using his slingshot. The technique can be loaded with various types of ammunition, including seastone items for capturing Devil Fruit users.

firstUse.context: Used to attack the falling Buffalo, Baby 5, and Caesar. The final shot contained seastone handcuffs that captured Caesar around the neck.
firstUse.result: Successfully captured Caesar Clown with seastone handcuffs

strengths: Can use various types of ammunition
